rooms.desc: There is a door to the east.
There is a door to the north and a door to the west.
There is a door to the north and a door to the south.

objects.desc: It looks like you can use it to shoot and kill things.
These are bullets that can be used with the gun.
It is just an ordinary apple.
They are a different kind of bullets. You remember reading somewhere that they can kill special monsters.

enemies.desc: It's a normal ant. It doesn't look like it can cause harm.
The zombie can only move very slowly.
The werewolf looks like it wants to attack you.
